original_text: And on the first day of Unleavened Bread, when they sacrificed the Passover lamb, his disciples said to him, “Where will you have us go and prepare for you to eat the Passover?”
korean_text: 무교절의 첫날 곧 유월절 양 잡는 날에 제자들이 예수께 여짜오되 우리가 어디로 가서 선생님께서 유월절 음식을 잡수시게 준비하기를 원하시나이까 하매

sentences.original_text: And on the first day of Unleavened Bread
when they sacrificed the Passover lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 유월절 어린 양을 잡을 때에

sentences.original_text: and prepare for you to eat the Passover?”
